message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and your appreciation for it, I propose a starting price of $11000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the significant benefits this product can bring to your needs.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $11000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $10500 for it.  This is a fair price that reflects the value to both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of our product and your interest, I am willing to negotiate at $10750. This price still reflects the high quality and value of the product while accommodating your budget.
